Text:
Hi mr. poothaijaa.
Here in this summer (July2011) I was in your lovely country Thailand on summer holidays , and then we go in Cinema , and see a movie The Moon , about the country singer Pumpuang Duangjan , I like tis movie so much , and would like to ask you , if you can help me , when the movie comes out on DVD , you can put it in here on Piratebay , so I will say kob khun krap .
